name: Dreamlands
description:
This is just a quick HTML5 build for the game I'm currently developing, Dreamlands.

Dreamlands is a turn based roguelike which aims to bring that classical gameplay to today's style and visual interest, as some older roguelikes are unwelcoming, Dreamlands aims to be a roguelike that is easier to get into, bringing new people to the genre.

This demo is just a very simple mechanic prototype and does not reflect at all what the finished game will be, the are lots of systems still under development and it lacks the aesthetics vision of the project. The purpose of this build is to gather some early feedback to work and improve the level generation and the turn based combat.

Hope you enjoy it and please leave any feedback on the comments section below!

PS: music and sound effects does not belong to me, they belong to the game Bloodborne.
